page.title: 07CASTLE GREEN FARM
page.content:
HISTORY:Somers Estate was sold and Mr.Phillips grandfather bought it in 1913.C 17th barn sold. It is made of interwoven wooden strips.
FIELD NAMES:Washcroft used as a sheep dip,Mud Close is a pond for horses,Pennings,Half Hyde is 14 acres,Broadfield and the Cleve.
CROPS:40 acres wheat 15 acres potatoes 60 acres barley 17 acres grass 34 field beans 12 acres hops 23 oats 10 acres woodland.
ANIMALS:The farm does not keep animals apart from a few chickens.
SPECIAL FEATURE:The farm includes the ancient fort of Castle Mound.
